titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Kenneth Reichard Photograph Collection
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Scenes of Stanford University campus life commissioned by the University for publicity and development, and for publication in the Stanford Alumni Review and other Stanford publications.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Kenneth Reichard Photograph Collection (PC0018). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Scenes of Stanford University campus life commissioned by the University for publicity and development, and for publication in the Stanford Alumni Review and other Stanford publications.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Stanford University. News and Publications Service
controlaccess.subject: Big Game.
Student life.

did.unittitle: Prints, miscellaneous: old clock tower, faculty housing area, and 5 enlargements from negative rolls

row.entry: Negative Roll Number
Description
Men's dorm or fraternity: sitting in lounge and guy washing dishes
At the Press: people working with type and on typewriters, etc.
At the Press: people at their desks, one man dealing with photographs
Campus firemen at the old firehouse
Hashers in dorm
At the Press (same people as in rolls 2 and 3)
ROTC color guard
Men's dorm or fraternity (same lounge as in Roll 1); half the images are quite dark
Hashers in dorm
Radio studio; men in dorm room
Campus firemen
Men in dorm rooms; group meeting (?)
Campus firemen
Lecture class and students at microscopes; possibly medical students (everyone in white lab coats)
Class in large lecture hall, possibly a law class; very few women students
Class scenes, possibly physics or engineering
Medical class (nurses and doctors)
Possibly a medical class (everyone is wearing white lab coats)
Art class (painting)
Class (all male students); two images of professor at chalk board
Class or lab scenes, students using microscopes, looking at animal skeletons
CC
Images of Dr. J. R. Miller and another doctor at work; both seem to be pediatricians
Classroom scenes, men and women students [not a Quad classroom]
Chemistry class (lab)
EE

medical students and/or interns
